metadata.name: Dreaming In Film #001
metadata.description:
"Sama Sama"

2020 | Bali Island, Indonesia

Artist: Joe McGrath

Edition: 1/1

My genesis NFT. The beginning of this journey.

While the world was ending March 2020 I was happily exploring the jungle world of Ubud on Bali Island.

A friend took us to the most beautiful water temple deep in the jungle. The temple follows a waterfall stream winding down a steep slope - stairways, statues, altars at every turn. Incense burning all around us, flower petals streaming down in the water.

The locals proceed to the base of the waterfall, submerging their heads in the stream, screaming out at the top of their lungs. 

We did too. It felt like screaming directly into every body of water on the planet. A guttural, cathartic experience. 

We cleansed at the base of the waterfall and offered more flower petals and incense at the altar, pictured here.

One of the most sacred experiences of my life.

Experiences like this continuously pull me out into the world searching for more out of life. 

Grateful grateful grateful.

---

"Why are the Balinese such a happy people? Because they're constantly in celebration..." -@sifouxsongs
